sentences.en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentences.cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentences.en: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.cn: 廉价商店

sentences.en: A cheap table can be transformed by an interesting cover.
sentences.cn: 一块趣味盎然的桌布就能使一张廉价桌子面目一新。

sentences.en: Anything that's cheap this year will be even cheaper next year.
sentences.cn: 今年的便宜货明年会更便宜。

sentences.en: as an investment for the future, the books are cheap at the price.
sentences.cn: 作为对未来的投资，这些书物超所值。

sentences.en: Calls cost 36p (cheap rate) and 48p (peak rate) per minute.
sentences.cn: 电话每分钟36便士（优惠费率）和48便士（高峰费率）。

sentences.en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
sentences.cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

sentences.en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentences.en: cheap rail fares
sentences.cn: 便宜的火车票

sentences.en: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.cn: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

sentences.en: Dena bought rolls of silk that seemed ridiculously cheap.
sentences.cn: 德娜买了几卷看起来非常次的丝绸。

sentences.en: If you want a cheap ride, take a minicab.
sentences.cn: 要想出行便宜，就坐小型出租车吧。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Nuclear plants are expensive to build, though cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 核电站造价高昂，虽然运转费用低廉。

sentences.en: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.en: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.cn: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.en: The colonel was sitting behind a cheap wooden desk.
sentences.cn: 上校坐在一张廉价的木桌后面。

sentences.en: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.cn: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.en: They had been forced to find cheap tickets in the gallery.
sentences.cn: 他们不得已买了顶层楼座的廉价票。

sentences.en: They tend to buy cheap processed foods like canned chicken and macaroni.
sentences.cn: 他们往往会买便宜的加工食品，像鸡肉罐头和通心粉之类的。

sentences.en: This coat was dirt cheap (= very cheap – an informal expression 非正式用语 ) .
sentences.cn: 这件外套超便宜。

sentences.en: traveled to Europe on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 极经济地到欧洲旅游

sentences.en: We drank ourselves into a stupor on cheap wine.
sentences.cn: 我们喝廉价葡萄酒喝得酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: With gin at 9p a tot, getting plastered is cheap and easy.
sentences.cn: 一小杯杜松子酒只要9便士，灌醉自己即便宜又容易。

phrases.tran_cn: 低利借款；来得容易的非正当收入；在钱上好商量的人
[口]觉得身体不舒服；感到惭愧
通过不昂贵的方式；便宜地

trans.tran_cn: 便宜的，廉价的，（言行）讨便宜的，吝啬的
trans.tran_en: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected
not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected
